msg: Better solution for the Reader problem: Like for the response writer
we create an OnDemandReader which is returned by a new OnDemandRequest
object which is used as the request field of the ScriptHelper

msg: Fixed a bug in the Aliases String Parser when an alias was finishing on an error.
